import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { }

Welcome to Bangalore

The Silicon Valley of India

Explore Now

Discover Bangalore

Rich History

Explore the fascinating history of Bangalore, from its founding by Kempe Gowda in 1537 to its transformation into a modern tech hub.

Learn More

Iconic Places

Visit Bangalore's most famous landmarks, gardens, palaces, and modern attractions that make the city unique.

Discover

Vibrant Culture

Experience the diverse cultural tapestry of Bangalore through its food, festivals, art, and traditions.

Experience

Quick Facts

1537

Population

~13 million
